name: CIAS Games Launcher
description:
The CIAS Games Launcher contains the following games which can be downloaded through the launcher:

Cyber Threat Defender

  CTD is an easy-to-play, engaging game regardless of age or skill level. Players must protect themselves from attacks while building robust networks in order to become a true Cyber Threat Defender! Whether the game is used to introduce middle school students to basic vocabulary, hone high school students’ understanding of defense implementation or provide reinforcement in professional training, CTD is a fantastic complement to any STEM or cybersecurity curriculum.

As San Antonio continues to lead the nation as a leader in cybersecurity, the CIAS at UTSA is excited to continue work to improve the culture of cybersecurity with a PC version of Cyber Threat Defender!

Project Cipher

Project Cipher is a computer game that introduces cryptography to players using techniques for encoding and decoding ciphers, or secret communications, to either hide or discover information.

Pyramid of Knowledge

Pryramid of Knowledge is a testing tool that provides educators with the ability to build their own quizzes for use in the "Pyramid" quiz interface to complement their STEM programs.
